mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveEmployeeList */ STD_ID AS "studentID" , STD_NM AS "studentName" , GENDER AS "gender" , DOB AS "dateOfBirth" , POB AS "placeOfBirth" , POS_DESC AS "positionDesc" , BANK_ACC_NO AS "bankAccountNo" FROM FRST.TBL_EMPLOYEE ORDER BY STD_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT /* RetrieveEmployeeTotalCount */ COUNT(*) AS "totalCount" FROM FRST.TBL_EMPLOYEE

SELECT /* RetrieveEmployeeDetail */ STD_ID AS "studentID" , STD_NM AS "studentName" , GENDER AS "gender" , DOB AS "dateOfBirth" , POB AS "placeOfBirth" , POS_DESC AS "positionDesc" , BANK_ACC_NO AS "bankAccountNo" FROM FRST.TBL_EMPLOYEE WHERE STD_ID = #{studentID}
SELECT /* RetrieveLastTeacherID */ TCH_ID AS "lastTeacherID" FROM FRST.TCH_DETAIL ORDER BY TCH_ID DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterTeacherDetail */ INTO FRST.TCH_DETAIL ( TCH_ID , FRST_NM , LAST_NM , NICK_NM , GENDER , DOB , POB , CUR_ADDR , PHONE , EMAIL , IMG_URL , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{teacherID} , COALESCE(#{firstName}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastName}, '') , COALESCE(#{nickName}, '') , COALESCE(#{gender}, '') , COALESCE(#{dateOfBirth}, '') , COALESCE(#{placeOfBirth}, '') , COALESCE(#{address}, '') , COALESCE(#{phone}, '') , COALESCE(#{email}, '') , COALESCE(#{imageUrl}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateEmployee */ FRST.TBL_EMPLOYEE SET STD_NM = COALESCE(#{studentName}, STD_NM) , GENDER = COALESCE(#{gender}, GENDER) , DOB = COALESCE(#{dateOfBirth}, DOB) , POB = COALESCE(#{placeOfBirth}, POB) , ADDRESS = COALESCE(#{address}, ADDRESS) , POS_DESC = COALESCE(#{positionDesc}, POS_DESC) , BANK_ACC_NO = COALESCE(#{bankAccountNo}, BANK_ACC_NO) WHERE STD_ID = #{studentID}
